name: Ogasawarayuta
body:
html,body { margin:0; padding:0; height:100%; background: #333333; font-size: 16px; } .fluid { width:100%; position: relative; padding-bottom: 56.25%; /* proportion value to aspect ratio 16:9 (9 / 16 = 0.5625 or 56.25%) */ padding-top: 30px; height: 0; overflow: hidden; } .fluid iframe.show { z-index:999; } .fluid iframe { border: none; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; z-index:-1; } .container { width:90%; height:90%; overflow: hidden; display: table; } .main { display: table-cell; height: 100%; background: #222; vertical-align: top; } .sidebar { width:380px; display: table-cell; background: #778899; height: 100%; } .sidebar iframe { border:0; } #tlkio { height: 100%; } .footer { width:100%; padding: 2px; font-size: .8em; color:#999; border-top:#666 1px solid; } .tabs { display:block; margin: 0px 0; padding: 0 10px; list-style: none; line-height: 1.444; width:100%; } .tabs li { display:block; float:left; margin:0; display: block; color:#AAA; text-decoration: none; padding:15px 10px ; font-size: .9em; } .tabs li:hover{ background-color: #111; color:#FFF; transition: all 0.5s ease; } li.checked { box-shadow: 0 -2px 5px #111; background: #000!important; color:#FFF; }
